text: Arthur "Art" Barnard (March 10, 1929 - May 1, 2018) was an American sprinter. He was born in Seattle, Washington. He competed mainly in the 110 m hurdles event, winning a bronze medal at the 1952 Summer Olympics.USC OLYMPIANS: 1904â€“2004 , USC Trojans Athletic Department, Accessed August 13, 2008. Barnard died in Stanford, California on May 1, 2018 at the age of 89.Arthur Barnard's obituary ==References== ==Other websites== * Arthur Barnard's obituary Category:1929 births Category:2018 deaths Category:American sprinters Category:Olympic bronze medalists for the United States Category:American hurdlers Category:Sportspeople from Seattle
title: Arthur Barnard
